title: Espinal’s two-run homer in ninth leads Blue Jays to win over Yankees - Sportsnet.ca
description: Espinal’s two-run homer in ninth leads Blue Jays to win over Yankees Sportsnet.ca Jack Curry on Gerrit Cole's Performance YESNetwork Ninth-inning home run bests Yankees in 4-2 loss to Blue Jays Pinstripe Alley Blue Jays implement new policies at camp amid con…
content: TAMPA Fla Santiago Espinal hit a two run homer in the top of the ninth as the Toronto Blue Jays won their fourth straight pre season baseball game with a victory over the New York Yankees in Grapefruit League action Tuesday Yankees reliever Ben Hel chars
